channel.title: How Do I Make ::item and ::pickup , I Have p16 v.6!
channel.description:
How do I make ::item and ::pickup, because I have Project16 v.6 and it is not on there, every mod and admin asks "Can you fix the ::item and ::pick?" and I say "I'll try!" So, can you please help me!
Thanks, cool dool

item.title: How Do I Make ::item and ::pickup , I Have p16 v.6!
item.dc:creator: @cool_dool cool dool
item.description:
@cool_dool wrote:

  Sorry, it dosen't work for me![br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2007, 04:11:54 PM[/size][hr]Anyone else?

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Make ::item and ::pickup , I Have p16 v.6!
item.dc:creator: @adamhack adamhack
item.description:
@adamhack wrote:

well dont know the code in p16 but i got it in testscape…
i will search it and edit it
PS: i made it work for admins only you can change it for everyone[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 06:58:27 PM[/size][hr] } else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 06:59:25 PM[/size][hr]post if it works…(surelly it works in testscape)

Read full topic
